fields.name: Place_and_Time_Date
fields.fieldText: Choose day and time of the meeting

textTemplates.name: body
textTemplates.text:
Hello {!currentLead.FirstName} {!currentLead.LastName}
You have one upcoming meeting
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Meeting parties
 
Meeting with {!$User.FirstName} {!$User.LastName}
 
 
 
Meeting subject
 
{!Meeting_subject_value}
 
 
 
 
Place and time
 
Place: {!Place_and_time_Address.street} {!Place_and_time_Address.city} {!Place_and_time_Address.country}
Time: {!Place_and_Time_Date}
 
 


If you have any questions, please contact your Agent.
